review.title: “Neo Events provides you early exposure to various events and promotions”
review.pros: Pros – Bangalore based full service event management and brand promotion company Neo Events provides you early exposure to various events and good experience to different people. very attractive payments and facilities. enjoying everyday and weekends!
review.cons: Cons – No private life. no transport facility,long working hours (sometimes)
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to focus more on long term benefits of current employees
